original_title: Want justice served to Easter Sunday victims...
original_body_lines: Actor-turned activist Jehan Appuhami, who once carried the cross in protest against the injustice done to the Easter Sunday victims, is being given water by a Buddhist monk to quench his thirst. Appuhamy who was engaged in a similar demonstration in the sweltering heat in Colombo Fort yesterday. Pix by Kushan Pathiraja
